attributes.action: Increase NHS pay by at least 5 percent.
attributes.additional_details: Throughout the Covid 19 pandemic, NHS staff, more than anyone else, have been the front line in fighting the virus. They have done their utmost to keep the entire health system running even when it was under the very real threat of being overwhelmed. Offering then a 1 percent rise is frankly an insult and in no way recognises their dedication and sacrifice. Failure to reward that service will risk driving people out of the NHS and may dissuade others from seeing the NHS as a career option.
attributes.background: NHS staff are worth more than a below inflation pay rise. For 2021 their pay should rise by more than inflation and by at least 5 percent.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Please give the NHS Covid Heroes a bigger pay rise.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577970

Recognise all members of NHS nursing profession by giving them a 12.5% pay rise
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560253

Give NHS Covid heroes a minimum 5% pay rise
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/578004
